v1.desc: My first portfolio website with a Windows 97 theme. I initially began with Create React App but later incorporated ExpressJS for server-side rendering.
v1.0: Improved performance through image optimization, page layout redesign, and code splitting with lazy/dynamic loading, boosting Lighthouse score from 66 to 90
v1.1: Switched from CSR to SSR using Express, resulting in a 2x reduction in initial loading speed

zapfit.desc: Freelance project for a personal training business initially built with RoR and PostgreSQL. Later rebuilt with the MERN stack due to PostgreSQL costs on Heroku.

only.desc: Platform web application that connects junior and senior developers to facilitate networking and career guidance. 2023 Ruby on Rails hackathon project.

plan.desc: Seating chart generator utilizing guests' preferences selected via personalized invitations.
